1536069895_1KuwwnkAtVrfnyhv8pyGRxLqzNZbE.body: you can always execute "python file.py" from Node anyway

You don't necessarily have to make it too hacky, another possible way would be to write an IPC-aware Python app directly running ZeroNet, so you can execute it from Node and communicate with standard IPC channel. Your Python app becomes just a "compatibility wrapper" between ZeroNet and Node binaries. How about that?

1534470841_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5.body: How good is P2P if govt can just use the tool like anyone, but with special accesses thanks to hardware backdoors?
